lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. West Texas Intermediate crude continues to trade above 20 dlrs a barrel, there is a greater chance that OPEC will raise its official 18 dlrs price," said Nauman Barakat, analyst at Smith Barney, Harris Upham and Co.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: OPEC conference president Rilwanu Lukman, who is Nigeria's oil minister, said Friday he expects the meeting in Vienna to be brief and calm and that OPEC's current price and production agreement may only need a slight review.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Extra (oil) inventories are needed during a time of crisis like this, and just general nervousness over an incident that could disrupt oil supplies drives prices up," Knuettel said.

lst.str: "Extra (oil) inventories are needed during a time of crisis like this, and just general nervousness over an incident that could disrupt oil supplies drives prices up," Knuettel said.
